name: Chester County Aviation
baseAirport: MQS -Chester County G O Carlson Airport
about: Chester County Aviation, located at the Chester County G.O. Carlson Airport (KMQS), is a premier flight training center recognized for its state-of-the-art programs. We offer a full range of flight instruction services, from initial private pilot certification to advanced ratings such as Certified Flight Instructor and Airline Transport Pilot. Our fleet includes modern, well-maintained aircraft from Cessna, Piper, Cirrus, and Robinson. We also provide aircraft rental, maintenance, and inspection services for all General Aviation needs. Our knowledgeable and accommodating instructors create a friendly and comfortable learning environment, utilizing an interactive online curriculum. Chester County Aviation is committed to making flight training fun, convenient, and affordable, helping you realize your dreams of flying.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
Simulator
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
